recipes.name: Veggie Stir Fry (Vegan)
recipes.instructions: Saut√© vegetables with garlic and soy sauce until tender.

recipes.name: Congee (Vegan)
recipes.instructions: Cook rice with water and ginger until porridge consistency.

recipes.name: Kung Pao Chicken (Non-Veg)
recipes.instructions: Stir fry chicken and vegetables with sauce and peanuts.

recipes.name: Veg Fried Rice (Vegan)
recipes.instructions: Fry rice with vegetables and soy sauce until hot.

recipes.name: Pad Thai (Non-Veg)
recipes.instructions: Cook noodles, stir fry with shrimp, egg, and sauce, top with peanuts.

recipes.name: Tofu Green Curry (Vegan)
recipes.instructions: Cook tofu and vegetables in coconut milk and green curry paste.

recipes.name: Spring Rolls (Veg)
recipes.instructions: Fill wrappers with vegetables, steam or bake until crispy.

recipes.name: Mango Sticky Rice (Veg)
recipes.instructions: Cook sticky rice, top with coconut milk and sliced mango.
